dialogueLines.line: I thought you were a human...but you're a little different, aren't you? Are you a fish
dialogueLines.speaker: lily

dialogueLines.line: I've never seen a fish girl like you before... I wonder if you taste more like a fish?
dialogueLines.speaker: lily

dialogueLines.line: Hey, can I take a bite of your tail later?
dialogueLines.speaker: lily

dialogueLines.line: Allow me to draw my *swordfish* for this fight!
dialogueLines.speaker: atlanta
